comment: She was a really great professor. Incredibly understanding and caring. She was very engaging in class, gave amazing feedback and support, and has a wonderful way of guiding her students in a way where they will want to learn and grow from the knowledge provided. Highly recommend
Lots of work, but not homework. She wants you to like volunteer and do a TON outside of class.

Karen was very sweet and inspirational. She was, by far, the easiest professor I had my freshman year. She teaches like a high school teacher, always reminding you for quizzes and tests. But still, you should keep up with her syllabus! I feel as though she truly cared about me and my future. Overall, she was a good teacher.

She is such a nice person and would recommend taking her class to anyone. Ksu class is not as easy as people think. We did a paper, midterm, group project, and an indv project! You will have to do some work in this class but not difficult. DONT BUY THE BOOK WE NEVER USED IT, WASTE OF MONEY!!!!! Oh and no reading for this class which I loved!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor Boettler cares about her students and their lives outside of the classroom. She gives a decent amount of homework, but if you follow the rubric exactly, you will do fine. She had only 2 tests but they weren't difficult if you studied and filled out her study guide. You cannot miss more than 3 classes. Overall, a wonderful professor!
Karen is amazing. She truly cares about her students and will do anything to help you succeed. She is funny and kind. If you need any help, just ask. She's pretty much my favorite professor ever.

I love Karen! She is sarcastic and goofy and so nice. If you have any issues just take the time to meet with her; she will go above and beyond to help you. She is a  fair grader but is sometimes unclear about what she wants. Take the time to ask for clarity and you will be fine.
Long story short....I wouldn't recommend this professor.

Do yourself a favor and do not take this professor!!! She is so unorganized I never have any idea what is going in in class.. Also, she never seems to care about anything and she has a bad attitude. I'm not doing well in what should be an easy class because Professor Boettler is so unclear. If you want to do well in KSU 1200 then stay far away!!
